Title: Aiding the Accord: Researchers Under Fire
Description:
Our allies once again seek your assistance as our efforts continue across the Isles. Words within the walls of Valdrakken whisper a resounding comfort knowing your efforts have helped shape our future.

Now then, to business.

Researchers of the Dragonscale Expedition are exploring the depths of Zaralek Cavern. They are asking for brave adventurers to help protect them from the many dangers in that area.

We await your return, $n.
ObjectivesText: Travel to Zaralek Cavern and protect the Researchers Under Fire. Continue your efforts in aiding the Valdrakken Accord and their allies throughout the Dragon Isles.
